entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
